00021 #ifndef GAMESTATE_H
00022 #define GAMESTATE_H
00023 
00024 #include "PlatformEngine.h"
00025 
00026 /**********************************************************/
00044 class GameState {
00045         public:
00046                 //** Prepares state subsystems and scripts.
00047                 virtual void Init( const char* theScript = NULL ) = 0 ;
00048 
00049                 //** Cleans up any remaining state assets.
00050                 virtual void Cleanup() = 0;
00051 
00052                 //** Halts execution of the state's operations.
00053                 virtual void Pause();
00054 
00055                 //** Resumes state execution.
00056                 virtual void Resume();
00057 
00058                 //** Handles any events that are particular to the state
00059                 virtual bool HandleEvents(  PlatformEngine* game,
00060                                         SDL_Event& event ) = 0;
00061 
00062                 //** Updates the state's logic
00063                 virtual void Update(        PlatformEngine* game ) = 0;
00064                 
00065                 //** Draws the visual content of the state to the engine. 
00066                 virtual void Draw(          SDL_Surface* mainScreen ) = 0;
00067                 
00068                 //** Explicitly Switches the engine to another state.
00069                 void ChangeState(       PlatformEngine* game,
00070                                         GameState* state ) {
00071                         game->ChangeState( state );
00072                 }
00073 
00074 
00075         protected:
00076                 bool running;
00077 
00078                 char* stateScriptPath;
00079 };
00080 
00081 #endif
